expression:EMFExpression.expression: row1.site.equals("RSV AURORA AUSTRALIS")? StringHandling.EREPLACE(row1.site,"RSV AURORA AUSTRALIS","Aurora Australis") : row1.site.equals("RV SOUTHERN SURVEYOR") ? StringHandling.EREPLACE(row1.site,"RV SOUTHERN SURVEYOR","Southern Surveyor") : row1.site.equals("RV TANGAROA") ? StringHandling.EREPLACE(row1.site,"RV TANGAROA","Tangaroa") : null
